ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
To save the life of a friend, Hellboy must track down a five-hundred-year-old, artificial man -- the Czege homunculus. The trail of horrors leads from desecrated cemeteries to a haunted ruin in this two-issue sequel to Wake the Devil. And in the first part of Gary Gianni's "Autopsy in B-Flat," Benedict and St. George settle in for a long night's stay in a mausoleum, spinning yarns of fish-headed women and the South Seas.
